ingredients: 2 tablespoons best-quality extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for serving
1/4 cup well-scrubbed, finely diced carrot (from 1/2 medium carrot)
1/4 cup finely diced celery (from 1 medium rib)
2 (14.5-ounce) cans of a combination of no-salt-added beans (chickpeas, borlotti, cannellini, etc.), drained and rinsed
1 cup canned Roma tomatoes with their juices, preferably an Italian brand, hand-crushed
4 ounces (1 cup) dried mixed pasta, such as a combination of ditalini, cavatelli and conchigliette
1/3 cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, plus more for serving
